title: Kip and David
subject_group: Climate, Environment, Natural Resources & Disasters/Natural history
description: A thirteen part children's adventure series made by Arthur and Corinne Cantrill about a young boy called David who meets a bushland elf while holidaying on Queensland's Stradbroke Island and embarks on a series of adventures that highlight Australia's wildlife and natural surroundings.
